full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 Bechtel Power Corporation Engineers - Constructors 12400 East Imperial Highway Norwalk, California 90650 BECHTET MAIL ADDRESS P.O. BOX 60860 - TERMINAL ANNEX, LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90060 TELEPHONE:(213) 864-6011 February 28, 1973 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: Subject: Charles Yen, S.S. FOIA (b)(6) 419 North Plymouth Blvd. , Los Angeles, California 90004 This is to certify that Charles Yen is employed by Bechtel Power Corporation as a Senior Engineer in the Civil & Structural section of the Engineering Department. Charles Yen was hired June 12, 1972 and currently receives a monthly salary of $1260. His prospects of continued employment are excellent. Bechtel Power Corporation is one of the world's largest engineering and construction firms and is recognized as a prime builder for industry and the United States Government. Very truly yours, BECHTEL POWER CORPORATION V. Stever Employee Relations Representative VS:dw
